Note that we enable tx pool consistency checks for regtest by default and regtest is the network used by the test framework. So an alternative could be to enable it by default for regtest. Though, the current patch is already a clear improvement.

For reference the help text of the bool arg:

I agree with @MarcoFalke - ideally, these checks should be enabled for `regtest` net automatically, similar to the mempool checks.  That seems much cleaner to me than enabling them using command-line arguments (because those can be forgotten / acidentally removed more easily).\n\nConcept ACK to running the checks regularly on `regtest`.
